item.title: Trump celebrates Australian imports of American beef
item.description: President Trump said he hopes farmers are happy after Australia announced it will open up imports of American beef.

item.title: Trump to meet with European Commission president during Scotland trip
item.description: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said she'll meet with President Trump in Scotland on Sunday to discuss trade relations.
